name: Peoples Republic of Noise
overview:
There are millions of musicians around the world struggling to succeed, and a wide array of businesses that need popular music and musicians- be it for their next tv spot, live event, or ad campaign. We crowd source talent selection for these businesses using our unique online battles, voted on by the masses of music lovers and fans. At the end of a battle the sponsor is left with fan validated musicians that have proven their music to be both popular and able to energize a large fan base,exactly what these businesses need at a fraction of the time and cost of their current solution. On PROnoise the Masses Discover and Musicians Succeed.

We will be releasing our first battle and new product on April 1st.
